QuestData.Title: The Last Guy
QuestData.Description:
You're not the first newcomer wanting to become famous. There've been a lot like you around!
The last few wanted to prove themselves by killing a giant bloodtusk... none of them ever returned! You want to get recognition?
Go find all those missing newcomers and kill the bloodtusk yourself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find $1oa Newcomer Corpses and slay Deadeye.
QuestData.RewardText: Too bad about the last few, but you're still here!
